website_summaries.verdict: Just about ticks all the boxes with a formula that’s gentle on delicate fibers, tough on stains, and mild enough for even the most sensitive skin.
pros: Lifts dirts and stains and eliminates odors
Contains no fragrance or harsh chemicals, making it a great option for sensitive skin
Recommended by leading cloth diaper manufacturers
Gentle on cloth diaper fibers, but strong enough for any laundry load
One package takes care of 80 high-efficiency loads
cons: Stubborn stains might need to be pre-treated

customer_reviews.title: Great detergent but spills in shipping
customer_reviews.text: The detergent works great. My only complaint is that when mine was shipped it was packaged with a bunch of other items including food and some of the laundry detergent spilled out of the box. It was not a lot, but it was enough to cover everything in the box with a fine layer of powdery laundry detergent.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Hoffmann

customer_reviews.title: Works really well to remove odors
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is good. It doesn't have a smell to it, but I dont mind. This stuff will get your clothes clean. I went through so many detergents trying to find something that will remove odor from stinky workout clothes. However, I would find that after washing and drying the clothes it still had a lingering smell. This stuff works! It killed all of the smells. My clothes were clean. I've only been using half of the cup per large load and this works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: I don't like it
customer_reviews.text: I have finally had a chance to test out my new box of this detergent. I will not buy it again. It does not clean well and doesn't dissolve well in water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my cloth diapers and regular laundry. It does a good job getting everything clean. Doesn't have much of a scent which I like because my daughter had sensitive skin and I don't like to use any fragrances etc. On her clothes.
customer_reviews.author: KHS

customer_reviews.title: Great for Cloth Diapers
customer_reviews.text: This is the only detergent I will use with our soft water to get our cloth diapers clean. I tried several and this detergent washes out so much better and the diapers have no scent! I love that there is no fragrance and it doesn't irritate my little one's behind. One box lasts us a few months as we just use it for diapers and occasionally really dirty kitchen rags.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria Hood

customer_reviews.title: My favorite laundry detergent
customer_reviews.text: This is now my favorite laundry detergent. Gets my clothes very clean and sweet smelling without fragrance problems. Best I have ever tried and a good price too.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon C.

customer_reviews.title: I really love this product for my cloth diapers
customer_reviews.text: I really love this product for my cloth diapers. Received package on delivery date, which was great. Packaging on the other hand was not so great. A lot of the product spill out and some how my other item I order came open and was covered in laundry soap. I was a little concern due to the other item being a skin product for my baby who has sensitive skin. Other than that no true complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: We have two children both with very sensitive skin. After staring this detergent they have had no issues! Love this stuff, plus a little goes along way.
customer_reviews.author: Haley Welton

customer_reviews.title: Clean and smelt good
customer_reviews.text: I had a sample of this and liked the way my towels smelt so I bought some and I really like it the only thing was it didn’t have a scooper but other than that I do like this product
customer_reviews.author: Kam

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I was having trouble with out cloth diapers, used enough of some other detergents to get the smell out but then coulden't rinse it all out and my babies would get rashes. Although I have to use much more of this then I did other detergents, I feel like it cleans them well and rinses out without too much work. Plus, only a couple rashes that were caused by BMs .. not the soap. yayy.
customer_reviews.author: NiftyMonkey

customer_reviews.title: My go to detergent
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite detergent! Cleans well and is relatively safe health wise.
customer_reviews.author: Happy cookie

customer_reviews.title: best for cloth diapers
customer_reviews.text: doesnt leave a residue and cleans my cloth diapers well.
customer_reviews.author: kmkrech

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! Been through many detergents in the non toxic world and landed on this one. I think the value is good and the scent is pleasing. I sun dry most of my clothes and it is extra special that way :)
customer_reviews.author: Irene Turner

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great for cleaning laundry
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great for cleaning laundry..The price is too much for me so I'm trying other brands but so far this is the winner (I cloth diaper and am often in the dirt gardening). I read a review you can get it cheaper in store...where I live none of the local grocers carry it but I'll keep looking!
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Works like Tide original powder without the "extras" on cloth diapers
customer_reviews.text: Works like Tide original powder without the "extras" (brighters, etc.) It also leaves our diapers super soft and no stinks out stains. Buyer beware of who you but it from though. I had a bad experience with the company I bought it through on Amazon. I really wish Amazon sold this directly.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Co

customer_reviews.title: Worth trying
customer_reviews.text: Verdict is still out on any reaction to skin that’s undesirable. But, great at keeping my clothes clean and stain free, also it doesn’t take much!
customer_reviews.author: Synthya

customer_reviews.title: Great laundry detergent
customer_reviews.text: Great product for septic tanks. Clothes come out fresh and clean!
customer_reviews.author: Soriah

customer_reviews.title: Good value, good for your skin, good for diapers
customer_reviews.text: I use this detergent on everything but specifically purchase it to launder cloth diapers. It works well enough, I usually add a 15 or 30 minute soak so that the cotton fibers have enough time to open up and mingle with the detergent. It does not leave residue and has no fragrance. I wish I could find this in a local store though. Sometimes when it arrives, the box is full of spilled detergent powder. Sometimes the box is in a heavy duty plastic bag. Kinda messy and never know what you are going to get when you open the box.
customer_reviews.author: Staceymacey

customer_reviews.title: Scentless, great value
customer_reviews.text: No complaints about how it cleans. I’ve been using it for 6 years and plan to keep using it as long as they make it :)
customer_reviews.author: HartRate

customer_reviews.title: Great for cloth diapers
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to clean my babies cloth diapers. It works wonderfully, and is much more affordable than other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Best detergent
customer_reviews.text: This detergent works, removes odors and stains, and is totally fragrance free and non-irritating. It is the best one I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Safe for cloth diapers
customer_reviews.text: We love this detergent for our cloth diapers especially but also use for regular laundry. Having it drop shipped to my home every other month is so helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Leis

customer_reviews.title: Love this detergent
customer_reviews.text: This detergent is beautiful. I use it to was my cloth diapers. A little goes a long way. I love how it smells. It has a very light clean scent. It cleans the diapers really well and my baby has had no diaper rashes.
customer_reviews.author: Emily S

customer_reviews.title: Great detergent
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this to wash my baby's cloth diapers, but liked it so much that it's become our household detergent. It is low suds so it's good for HE washers.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Kreit

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as Nellie's
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't smell good. Doesn't really smell like anything and it doesn't disintegrate like nellie's. There's always blue clumps of it left in the detergent dispenser after the cycle.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy T

customer_reviews.title: Great for cloth diapers
customer_reviews.text: I love this detergent! And it came fast and it didn't spill out of the box. great!
customer_reviews.author: SarahPH

customer_reviews.title: Country save is the best.
customer_reviews.text: I love this laundry detergent. It cleans my husband's dirty stinky work clothes leaves them fresh and clean smelling and all my laundry comes out clean and fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Economical and Efficient
customer_reviews.text: Launders just fine. Good product for those with coconut allergies. Does not contain any ingredients derived from coconut.
customer_reviews.author: Considerate

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I've used my new detergent a few times, and I am pretty impressed. It's basically made of salts, so there's no chemicals. That's why I bought it. It's also great because I don't have to use very much of it in the wash. And, it definitely cleans! I was pretty skeptical, but have not been able to detect any of the pre-washing odors. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Grace

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: didn't get my cloth diapers clean enough. Not a huge fan.
customer_reviews.author: Ranya

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This detergent does not get my cloth diapers clean after the first use they started getting barnyard smell.
customer_reviews.author: Violet Smith

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for the cloth diapers I'm using with my child. Works good so far. I only use half a scoop with each load.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Marie Kerr

customer_reviews.title: This lasts a long time and works great!
customer_reviews.text: Had a hard time finding highly-recommended laundry detergent for cloth diapers that was also cruelty-free. This lasts a long time and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Dayna G.

customer_reviews.title: Best out there!
customer_reviews.text: Love this GREAT detergent! Works well with everything from cloth diapers to soiled bed sheets! Wouldn't get anything else on the market...
customer_reviews.author: MKTebbe

customer_reviews.title: But I know the stuff works great on cloth diapers
customer_reviews.text: I guess I thought it would be a little bigger. But I know the stuff works great on cloth diapers!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Skiba

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for sure!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely helped get that "left in the washer too long" smell out of the towels and shirts!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cleans great in all temperature washes
customer_reviews.text: Leaves fabrics soft and clean with no irritating residue or scents. Will definitely be a returning customer.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Great detergent!
customer_reviews.text: Got this to use for cloth diapers; works great. Also started using it on my dark loads since my normal liquid detergent sometimes leaves residue on my black items.
customer_reviews.author: Hanna Shanes

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this for our cloth diapers! You just use a little.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Great for adult clothes but gave our baby a bad rash.
customer_reviews.text: Works great and very effective even in small quantities but gave our baby a bad burn with cloth diapers even after an extra rinse. Fantastic on our clothes though. Your experience may vary as many others have had great luck with it for cloth diapers.
customer_reviews.author: llamaface

customer_reviews.title: Working well for cloth diapers
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my cloth diapers! Been using it for about 5 months and haven't had any issues with the diapers. They come out fresh and clean!
customer_reviews.author: C Roll

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, however I wish it was scented
customer_reviews.author: Brian West

customer_reviews.title: Natural detergent
customer_reviews.text: Most clean and natural laundry detergent! Love this stuff not only to clean my cloth diapers but the rest of the family's clothes!
customer_reviews.author: jstar0279

customer_reviews.title: We use it because recommended to clean diapers and it works
customer_reviews.text: Its laundry soap, not much else to say. We use it because recommended to clean diapers and it works good
customer_reviews.author: Crabs

customer_reviews.title: I like the product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the item just to try it as I was new to the cloth diaper world. I like the product, however amazon has it priced higher than other vendors.
customer_reviews.author: rose cosme

customer_reviews.title: Good service
customer_reviews.text: Good job! I got what I ordered and it was fast shipping. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great especially if you sensative to fragrances.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Hinojos

customer_reviews.title: Ya Country Save
customer_reviews.text: I gave this a 5 because it works great for our cloth diapers, gets them nice and clean!! I would recomended to all cloth diapering mamas!
customer_reviews.author: Justine

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: got the stinky smell out of my diapers. you only need a tiny amount to get your cd's smelling clean.
customer_reviews.author: anne

customer_reviews.title: worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my cloth diapers and did not irritate my sons sensitive skin! I will buy it again. It was worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Black debris noted in soap
customer_reviews.text: I have used this previously and had good results. This time it has black debris in the soap, not happy and would like to return.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived bent and open in a ziplock plastic bag. Detergent spilled out into the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Boxed laundry detergent
customer_reviews.text: Trying to get away from plastics. This comes in a box. It's not a name brand but it works great and gets my laundry clean. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Really Effective Product!
customer_reviews.text: I have a student residence for male students. They are telling me that this is a very nice product for washing their clothes. I want to add that young male students are not the most fastidious group -- often waiting a long while before washing their clothes. Company service is truly outstanding. I had a question, and they answered it in less than 24 hours. This low suds soap is good for both front and top loading machines.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Collingwood

customer_reviews.title: Allergy aid
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product at the WorldMark Resorts for several years and have recently found some allergies to products I have been using at home. We just enjoyed a week of vacation at a WorldMark resort again and found that my allergies were much better with use of this laundry product so I came home and ordered a box. I am looking forward to using it and will see where it goes from there. Thank you for the quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Kirkpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Cloth diapers
customer_reviews.text: Never been disappointed in this product. I use this for my cloth diapers and it makes them clean there's no residue and they always smell good afterwards. If you're using cloth diapers it's worth the extra price to buy this product. I use a very small amount with each load and not noticing any leftover smells or stains. I also sundry and sun bleach my cloth diapers.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Ann Marie Burns

customer_reviews.title: We finally found detergent for our family
customer_reviews.text: This detergent is the best we have tried. After years of trying... probably about 20 different brands more or less environmentally safe brands we finally found this. All clothing, outdoor equipment, cloth diapers (finally without funky smell!), uniforms, shoes, dogs beds.... everything it’s now washed in this detergent , smells clean, no parfume masking weird smells, looks better than before, doesn’t ruin any material so far. One box 2 months supply, family with pets and 5kids. Very happy and pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible at Removing Stains
customer_reviews.text: I like that it's natural and the amount of sudsing is just right but it is absolutely terrible at removing even basic food stains. It did not even remove a fresh tomato sauce stain. You definitely need to use it with a stain removal product and presoak any soiled clothing. I tried it with Clorox 2 and had better luck. I will probably not repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ohio Farmer

customer_reviews.title: A great free and clear option
customer_reviews.text: We started using Country Save when I was cloth diapering because it is a free and clear detergent that also has no optical brighteners. It is tough on all sorts of stains from baby messes to my hubby's garage spills, We have been using it for 5 years now with no plan to switch to anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Eco friendly and allergen free
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this for years after reacting to every other natural and fragrance free detergent I bought. My clothes smell clean and fresh without any fragrance needed. Biodegradable is a plus sin e we are on a septic system. Worked great on my sons cloth diapers too. Love, love, love this product!
customer_reviews.author: EMD

customer_reviews.title: Fluffiest, softest laundry ever!😊
customer_reviews.text: I have truly loved this detergent. I am sensitive (so are my kids) and this one doesn’t irritate our skin and leaves our clothes so soft and crazy fluffy. Glad I went with it and it should last me a long time! 😊
customer_reviews.author: Speedy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome laundry detergent for cloth diapers!
customer_reviews.text: When it arrived there was some powder that came out of the box from shipping. It wasn't a lot, but just more of an annoyance. I think I would probably see if they had liquid next time. I have a front loader washer and use a little over a scoop when washing my cloth diapers. I wash covers, prefolds and pockets all together (probably about 20 diapers). I tried a half a scoop and noticed a little odor left over. I noticed a few times my pul covers had a little powder residue, but nothing to complain about. Overall, if you are a cloth diaper mama I would highly recommend this. It gets the diapers really clean and bright.
customer_reviews.author: nat

customer_reviews.title: Great deodorizer!
customer_reviews.text: This was the laundry packets a hotel gave me to use, didn't look like much, but it really got my clothes clean and they smelled great! I have washed towells, underwear, sweaty workout clothes, etc and everything smells fresh. Not perfumey, just fresh and clean. I am now ordering it for use at home.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda NJ

customer_reviews.title: Great for Cloth diapers but not Heavy stains
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value for cloth diapers as its cheap & wont clog the pores. We find we have to sun dry the diapers every so often though bc of the stains & odors this soap, or any cloth diaper friendly soap in our budget will not remove. We use this for our general laundry too but notice it doesnt get out stains on really soiled big people clothes so we use Clorox 2 on our mud stains and hubby work clothes. After we are done potty training we will probably replace this by making our own soap using one of the borax & stuff recipes as it is cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Steve H.

customer_reviews.title: Efficient and green option
customer_reviews.text: We use it for cloth diaper and so far so good. I love the fact it comes in a recyclable paper packaging with No plastic at all. It seems they are genuine about protecting environment and your skin. We use 1/2 scoop in the cold pre wash cycle and 1 scoop in the hot cycle so don’t think you will make 80 loads with it even on a HE machine. And it will end up more expensive that you think.
customer_reviews.author: Florent

customer_reviews.title: Cloth diapers sparkle now
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several big name brand detergents that are scent-free. But still had ammonia issues with my prefolds. Today I tried a half scoop of this detergent in my front loader HE washing machine and WOW. Cleanest I've ever seen.
customer_reviews.author: MotherofChickens

customer_reviews.title: Great for cloth diapers and clothes
customer_reviews.text: This is great detergent. This is a small box of it. I thought it would be larger and I was having a hard time picturing until it arrived that it is about half the size of the big box but it was a good way to try out the detergent to see if it would work well in our nasty well water. I used this detergent with cloth diapers for quite a long time in the past with different water but since we moved 3 years ago we have had no luck in finding something that doesn't make our clothes continue to stink. This did the trick! Our clothes no longer smell and our diapers are cleaner than ever!
customer_reviews.author: A Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Lasts a long time
customer_reviews.text: We’re glad to have CountrySave back in our lives! Because of convenience in buying I tried other laundry products but was never as satisfied as CS. Clothes are feeling and smelling fresh. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for maybe soft water
customer_reviews.text: Good product for those with soft water. Did not work with my cloth diapers. They stunk. I switched to tide powder and no issues. Very hard water in SoCal
customer_reviews.author: Danielle L. Stavrinadis

customer_reviews.title: Nice - packaging could be more secure
customer_reviews.text: I like the detergent - box arrived with product spilling out but transferred to another container. I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: Clean and Natural
customer_reviews.text: I like that it natural with no order and doesn't clump up. I changed from liquid as over time the liquid was making stickey residue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Laundry Detergent EVER, Awesome for Cloth Diapers
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my favorite laundry detergent EVER. I was looking for something that would work for our cloth diapers but also for our clothing and other household items without breaking the bank. Country Save is it! It gets my clothes/diapers/bedding clean without leaving a residue or scent. We have eczema and sensitive skin in our family, and this has absolutely helped our winter breakouts. I will never use anything else!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I use a front loader and often have that mildewy smell no matter what detergent I use. This detergent eliminated that odor and made my clothes fresh and clean.
customer_reviews.author: GeoDad

customer_reviews.title: STINKS
customer_reviews.text: There is a lingering off putting smell. No matter how little I used and rinsed 3 times still there. STINKS.... YUCK
customer_reviews.author: Francine Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: My favorite laundry soap. I bought it to use to wash my cloth diapers. It's the most pure fresh smelling soap.if you hang your clothes to dry the smell after is AMAZING.
customer_reviews.author: KONIEV C.

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional product.
customer_reviews.text: The only detergent I will use! Highly recommend to anyone who has any sensitive skin issues.
customer_reviews.author: bunny rust

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for residue-free laundry
customer_reviews.text: Keeping in mind that we have soft water and use this detergent primarily for cloth diapers, here is what we've found: PROS: - small box lasts a surprisingly long time -leaves no residue at all, best detergent I've ever used as far as rinsing clean -affordable price CONS: - seems to be rough on fabric. Cloth quickly had noticeable wear, tear, and aging after I began using this -like most powder detergents, it clumps and hardens over time in the box -box leaks powder from corners. Obviously not good when it has to be shipped, arrived very messy
customer_reviews.author: Carlo

customer_reviews.title: Simple, clean, and effective
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It's simple, clean, and gets the job done for a reasonable price per load. We use it for our cloth diapers and baby clothes. Our little guy has never had any skin reactions, so it must be working as it should. My only complaint is that it doesn't close up as securely as I would prefer once opened.
customer_reviews.author: tristin

customer_reviews.title: This laundry detergent is the best I have used
customer_reviews.text: This laundry detergent is the best I have used. I like a natural product with no scent and no harsh chemicals. This is the best I have found that gets clothes clean as well. Brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: louloubell

customer_reviews.title: Has a funny sort of smell to it
customer_reviews.text: Has a funny sort of smell to it, not at all like the fresh laundry smell I was imagining from the product title. The smell is not bad, just not was I was expecting. Cleans very well and works great for my cloth diaper cleaning regimen (hand washing in hot water+water softener+detergent).
customer_reviews.author: Miriam

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Excellent for cloth diapers and it even works great on my husband's sweaty clothes. It lasts forever, too. We bought a smaller box and still have almost half of it left after 9 months, though we usually only use it for diapers and the baby's clothes/blankets.
customer_reviews.author: Zaphod

customer_reviews.title: Meet all expectations this product delivers. Clothes are bright ...
customer_reviews.text: Meet all expectations this product delivers. Clothes are bright, clean, stains gone and much whiter compare to previous detergents used.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen C.

customer_reviews.title: Great! Even washed my boyfriend's very (I mean
customer_reviews.text: Great! Even washed my boyfriend's very (I mean, VERY) dirty laundry from his sheet metal career. However, we keep it in the basement. So, there is some humidity causing it to clump up. But, hey! That would be a problem for any powder-like substance Who cares, still works just great.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Great buy if you are cloth diapering!
customer_reviews.text: Been using on my cloth diapers for about 6 weeks with no issues. But I always use 1 full scoop for top loader, hot wash and an extra cold rinse. No residue build up, no repelling, smell clean after regular drying cycle.
customer_reviews.author: FromUnderaPalmTree

customer_reviews.title: Country Save is an apt name  !
customer_reviews.text: This is my third purchase of this detergent. Obviously I like it! Does the job, using less than some of the other brands I've used over the years. good product and good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Sirde

customer_reviews.title: Works fine. Doesn't really do anything for stains
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. Doesn't really do anything for stains. I personally don't like powder detergent, so that may make me like it less automatically. I just couldn't find a liquid cloth diaper detergent at the time.
customer_reviews.author: J. M.

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: This is the only detergent I can use because of my husband's sensitive skin
customer_reviews.author: Anita Mott

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: PROS: great price cleans well smells good CONS: The scooper was at the bottom of the detergent. We didn't find it until we were almost done with the box.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best detergent I've used! Gets urine smell out of toddler's sheets when they wet the bed, sweat smell out of my husband's t-shirts and works great on the baby's cloth diapers. Other free and clear type products I've used left everything smelling kind of stagnant...this detergent just leaves everything smelling fresh. I definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Raelene Y.

customer_reviews.title: So-So Detergent
customer_reviews.text: This detergent works fine on most clothes but it does not handle stains very well. It is safe for those with sensitive skin and allergies though. But because it could not work on common food stains, I am still searching for a product that will work for me.
customer_reviews.author: HarborLola

customer_reviews.title: ... daughter's cloth diapers and our clothes and I absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.text: I use this detergent on my daughter's cloth diapers and our clothes and I absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Goss

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I use for my cloth diapers, and it never leaves residue. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: LaDonna Chavez

customer_reviews.title: it's okay
customer_reviews.text: I wish it clean on the first was, but i have to use tide on the first was, the use this on the 2nd.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Elidor

customer_reviews.title: Diaper washing detergent
customer_reviews.text: Best laundry detergent for washing baby diapers. Used for two babies diapers and have never had diaper rash issues due to detergent.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Smaller box than you think
customer_reviews.text: Buy it local for a lot less if you can. The detergent itself works fine (we use it for cloth diapering). However, it cost as much as a box twice the size we bought from the place we bought our cloth diapers from.
customer_reviews.author: T.J.

product_meta.title: Country Save Biodegradable Non Toxic Fragrance Free Laundry Detergent Powder for Cold and Warm Washing in HE and Regular Machines - 5 lb (80 oz)
product_meta.description: Save Money! A small amount of Country Save laundry detergent goes a long way. Our natural laundry detergent powder is ultra-concentrated and unscented. There’s NO air and NO other filler ingredients. Get 80 scoops from 5lb pack of laundry detergent powder or 80 HE loads from such small box! Hypoallergenic and Effective Laundry Detergent with EPA Certification - The Country Save laundry detergent for sensitive skin is fragrance-free with no harsh chemicals. A laundry detergent for sensitive skin that’s made from environment-friendly ingredients, it’s safe even for newborn babies. For All Types of Clothes & Colors - This baby detergent powder is chosen by leading cotton diaper manufacturers as the most effective and best detergent for moms to use. It can whiten and remove tough stains in microfiber cloth diapers and inserts made from natural fibers, such as cotton and bamboo prefolds. It is also the perfect choice of chemical-free laundry powder for toddler clothes, underwear and other garments of the rest of the family. It cleans whites and brightens colors. No Extra Rinsing; No Residue - Worried about residue on your clothes? Our low-suds formula-based detergent effectively dissolves in small amount of water and rinses out completely. Keep your septic tank safe with no fillers or foaming agents. Is it only for HE Machines? - This laundry powder is specifically designed for HE machines, but it is compatible with regular machines as well. Regular machines will require a full 1-2 scoops as needed. For Soiled Laundry - Use warm water to lift tough stains better and makes Country Save high efficiency detergent more effective. Ingredients: Sodium carbonate, Sodium sulphate, Sodium percarbonate, Sodium alkyl aryl sulfonate and Linear alcohol ethoxylate
feature_bullets: COMPATIBLE WITH REGULAR and HE MACHINES - Country Save unscented laundry detergent HE powder works with regular and high efficiency machines (top load or front load). Use 1 full scoop for regular washes (40 loads) and a half scoop for HE machine washes (80 loads)

SAFE, GENTLE and CHEMICAL FREE LAUNDRY DETERGENT - Country Save laundry powder is fragrance and dye free. This all natural laundry detergent is safe even for baby’s sensitive skin and effective in removing tough stains

LOW-SUDS FORMULA HYPOALLERGENIC DETERGENT - With low-suds formula, our natural detergent laundry soap powder is septic safe; a powdered laundry detergent that dissolves and rinses out completely and leaves no residue on clothes

ALL NATURAL LAUNDRY SOAP FOR SOFT and HARD WATER - Dissolve this non toxic detergent in a small amount of water before you pour into washer. It leaves your clothes as clean and soft as you’ve always wanted. No need for fabric softeners and can be used as cloth diaper detergent

EPA CERTIFIED - 100% Phosphate free; environmentally friendly ingredients make Country Save’s dye free laundry detergent EPA Certified. You get cleaner, brighter clothes with a cruelty free laundry detergent that won’t destroy the planet with harmful chemicals
